summary: This is an email forwarding a collection of news article links from October 13, 2020, related to the Epstein/Maxwell case and other general news topics. The email highlights media coverage of Ghislaine Maxwell's legal efforts to keep a deposition secret and other Epstein-related financial and investigative stories.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Subject of news articles regarding her legal efforts to keep a damaging deposition secret from the public.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned in the context of news articles, including one about a withdrawal of $300k cash.

persons.name: Leon Black
persons.context: Subject of a CNN business article linked in the email, regarding his connections to Jeffrey Epstein.

connections.description: Both are central figures in the linked news articles concerning the criminal case and Maxwell's efforts to seal court documents.
A CNN business article is linked discussing Leon Black's connections to Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Maxwell Seeks to Seal Deposition
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell's legal team is urging a U.S. appeals court to keep a damaging deposition secret, as reported in multiple news outlets.

events.title: Epstein $300k Cash Withdrawal Report
events.description: A news article reports on Jeffrey Epstein withdrawing $300,000 in cash.

keyFacts: On October 13, 2020, there was significant media coverage of Ghislaine Maxwell's legal maneuver to keep a damaging deposition secret.
News articles from that date also covered Jeffrey Epstein's financial activity, specifically a $300,000 cash withdrawal.
The email forward includes a link to a CNN article about Leon Black's connections to Jeffrey Epstein.
The document is a simple email forward of news clips, indicating ongoing public and media interest in the case at that time.
